text: Blimey! Don't scare me like that. On a night like this... I took you for a monster. Oh, thank the stars, you're fairly normal... Was it you put down that awful beast? Oh, that thing had me trembling, frozen in me boots. And then you came along. Well... if you're a hunter... then... Would you know of any safe havens?
Oh yeah, of course not... I should've known. This whole place's falling apart, once again... It's the curse of Yharnam...
